name: Task
description: Start a new autonomous agent to handle complex multi-step tasks. The subagent will work independently and return its final result to you. Use this tool when you need to delegate a self-contained task that requires multiple steps or specialized focus.

description.description: A short (3-5 word) description of the task

prompt.description: The task for the agent to perform. Be specific and clear about what needs to be accomplished.

subagent_type.description: The type of specialized agent to use for this task (e.g., 'code-reviewer', 'debugger', 'researcher'). If no custom agents are defined, use 'default'.
